name: Introduction to Postcolonial Literature
description: This course will introduce students to the works, styles, authors, and themes of Postcolonial Literature.

name: Colonialism and Imperialism
description: This course will explore the history, politics, and culture of colonialism and imperialism, and how these have shaped Postcolonial Literature.

name: Postcolonial Theory
description: This course will introduce students to the various theories and approaches used to interpret Postcolonial Literature.

name: Advanced Postcolonial Literature
description: This course will explore the more complex works, styles, authors, and themes of Postcolonial Literature.
